original_text: I visited your town but you did not ask me to stay in your home. I did not have enough clothes but you did not give me anything to wear. I was ill but you did not take care of me. I was in prison but you did not come to visit me.”
korean_text: 나그네 되었을 때에 영접하지 아니하였고 헐벗었을 때에 옷 입히지 아니하였고 병들었을 때와 옥에 갇혔을 때에 돌보지 아니하였느니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: but you did not ask me to stay in your home
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나에게 집에 머물러달라고 청하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: I did not have enough clothes
but you did not give me anything to wear
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나에게 입을 것을 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but you did not take care of me
but you did not come to visit me
